CustomField.formula: IF ( AND ( ISPICKVAL (Position__c, "DEPUTY"), ISPICKVAL (Title__c ,"Deputy Labor Commissioner") ), IF( TODAY () - Start_of_employment__c > 365 , 100000, 75000) , ( IF ( AND ( ISPICKVAL (Position__c, "DEPUTY"), ISPICKVAL (Title__c ,"Industrial Relations Representative") ), IF ( TODAY () - Start_of_employment__c > 365, 75000, 50000), ( IF ( AND ( ISPICKVAL (Position__c, "DEPUTY"), ISPICKVAL (Title__c ,"Management Services Technician") ), IF( TODAY () - Start_of_employment__c > 365, 75000, 50000),null)))))
CustomField.label: Goal
